input-forms.form-definitions:
dc creator
true Creator(s) name Enter the name(s) of the creator(s) of this item. You must enter the creator of the item
dc title
false Title onebox Enter the main title of the item. You must enter a main title for this item.
dc identifier
DOI onebox The item's digital object identifier code, if available.
dc date issued false Publication Date date workflow Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
dc publisher
false Publisher onebox workflow Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.
dc date updated false Revision Date date Please give the date the item was last modified. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable. You must choose a revision date.
dc subject
true Subject(s) dropdown Select the subject of the main content of the item (hold Ctrl/Cmd while clicking to select multiple subjects). If the subject does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. You must choose a subject.
dc subject other true Other Subject(s) onebox If you choose 'Other' subject, please enter details here.
dc description abstract false Description textarea Enter the description of the item.
dcterms audience
true Audience Level dropdown
dc relation ispartof true Course(s) taught in dropdown
dc relation ispartof true Other Course(s) onebox If you choose 'Other' course, please enter details here.
dc creator
true Creator(s) name Enter the name(s) of the creator(s) of this item. You must enter the creator of the item
dc title
false Title onebox Enter the main title of the item. You must enter a main title for this item.
dc identifier
DOI onebox The item's digital object identifier code, if available.
dc date issued false Publication Date date workflow Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.

false Publisher onebox workflow Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.
dc date updated false Revision Date date Please give the date the item was last modified. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable. You must choose a revision date.

dc subject other true Other Subject(s) onebox If you choose 'Other' subject, please enter details here.
dc description abstract false Description textarea Enter the description of the item.
